# fetchAssetCollections(with:subtype:options:)

**Type Method**

Retrieves asset collections of the specified type and subtype.

## Declaration

```swift
class func fetchAssetCollections(with type: PHAssetCollectionType, subtype: PHAssetCollectionSubtype, options: PHFetchOptions?) -> PHFetchResult<PHAssetCollection>
```

## Parameters

- **type**: A type of asset collection, such as an album or a moment. See [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetCollectionType].
- **subtype**: A subtype of asset collection. See [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetCollectionSubtype].
- **options**: Options that specify a filter predicate and sort order for the fetched asset collections, or `nil` to use default options. For details, see [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHFetchOptions].

## Return Value

A fetch result that contains the requested [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHAssetCollection] objects, or an empty fetch result if no objects match the request.

## Discussion

By default, the returned [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHFetchResult] object contains all asset collections with the specified type and subtype. To retrieve a more specific set of asset collections, provide a [doc://com.apple.photokit/documentation/Photos/PHFetchOptions] object containing a filter predicate.

## Fetching Asset Collections

- **fetchAssetCollections(withLocalIdentifiers:options:)**: Retrieves asset collections with the specified unique identifiers.
- **fetchAssetCollectionsContaining(_:with:options:)**: Retrieves asset collections of the specified type containing the specified asset.
- **fetchAssetCollections(withALAssetGroupURLs:options:)**: Retrieves asset collections using URLs provided by the Assets Library framework.
- **fetchMoments(inMomentList:options:)**: Retrieves asset collections in the specified moment list collection.
- **fetchMoments(with:)**: Retrieves asset collections corresponding to moments seen in the Photos app.
